name: Wave Me
description:
Wave Me is a game that's about defeating waves of enemies and getting to the end. Is there an end? Play the game to find out! This project is very inspired by dani's game "Fair n square".  I'm planning to upgrade the graphics and gameplay in the future. Go download and have fun!

Square - wad, space to move,   mouse and hold to aim and shoot

Triangle - wad, space to move,   left shift to dash (use mouse to aim)
